ninja.leaping.configurate.objectmapping

Class ObjectMapper<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ninja.leaping.configurate.objectmapping.ObjectMapper<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type to work with

    public class ObjectMapper<T>
extends Object
    This is the object mapper. It handles conversion between configuration nodes and fields annotated with Setting in objects. Values in the node not used by the mapped object will be preserved.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ObjectMapper.BoundInstance
      Represents an object mapper bound to a certain instance of the object
      protected static class  ObjectMapper.FieldData
      Holder for field-specific information

        Create a new object mapper that can work with objects of the given class
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type
        Parameters:
        clazz - The type of object
        Returns:
        An appropriate object mapper instance. May be shared with other users.

        ObjectMappingException - If invalid annotated fields are presented

      • constructObject

        protected T constructObject()
                     throws ObjectMappingException
        Create a new instance of an object of the appropriate type. This method is not responsible for any population.
        Returns:
        The new object instance
        Throws:
        ObjectMappingException - If constructing a new instance was not possible

      • canCreateInstances

        public boolean canCreateInstances()
        Returns whether this object mapper can create new object instances. This may be false if the provided class has no zero-argument constructors.
        Returns:
        Whether new object instances can be created

      • bind

        public ObjectMapper.BoundInstance bind(T instance)
        Return a view on this mapper that is bound to a single object instance
        Parameters:
        instance - The instance to bind to
        Returns:
        A view referencing this mapper and the bound instance

      • bindToNew

        public ObjectMapper.BoundInstance bindToNew()
                                     throws ObjectMappingException
        Returns a view on this mapper that is bound to a newly created object instance
        Returns:
        Bound mapper attached to a new object instance
        Throws:
        ObjectMappingException - If the object could not be constructed correctly
